verbose_text: Identification of the pathway (s) of Arp2/3 activation was investigated through knockout strains of HSPC300, a component of the WAVE complex which activates Arp2/3 in actin polymerization responsible for membrane protrusion and cell motility, and WASH which activates Arp2/3 in the endocytic pathway.
evidence: activates Arp2/3 in actin polymerization responsible for membrane protrusion and cell motility, and WASH
